data.content: KnotsBackend implementation verified complete on main. All 5 sub-tasks shipped: CLI wrapper (knots.ts, 450 lines), BackendPort adapter (knots-backend.ts, 1010 lines), contract tests (knots-backend.test.ts, 587 lines, 43/43 passing), factory wiring (backend-factory.ts). Capabilities: create, update, close, search, query, listReady, dependencies, labels, sync. Delete unsupported by design. Build failure on /beads page is pre-existing useContext issue, unrelated to knots backend.
